about_the_game:
When you start the game, you become a girl wandering through fields to find the exit.
You'll encounter many obstacles in a new world after passing through the city.
However, save points will always bring you back.
As long as you don't give up, there is no "game over".

This is a demo version of The Great Escape.

If you want to enjoy further adventures, meet us in the full version!

name: The Great Escape Demo
short_description: "The Great Escape" is a 2D platformer game where you explore each stage, collect keys, and find the exit. Dangerous obstacles and challenging terrain may block your path, but if you keep going, you can reach the portal to escape. Help them make her escape!
